metadata.dc:title: Diagnóstico precoz de la hemorragia digestiva alta, hematemesis y/o melena mediante la panendoscopia de urgencia.
[Early diagnosis of upper digestive hemorrhage, hematemesis and/or melena by means of an emergency panendoscopy].
